items.title: Enter momentum funds high-risk, high-reward strategy with 7-year horizon
items.description: "Factor investing is growing rapidly in India. Among factor funds, momentum is the largest and the most popular strategy," says Pratik Oswal, chief of business, passive funds, Motilal Oswal AMC

items.title: Tax change, spike in inflows revive interest in Rs 84,000-crore FoF space
items.description: FoFs typically pool investment capital into a wider portfolio of several investment funds instead of investing in single funds or specific individual securities
